headline: 'I Was Making Money Not Doing Anything,' Says Barstool Founder Dave Portnoy, Claiming He Can Now Pull In $5 Million A Week
summary: Making money is easy once you hit a breakthrough, Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy says. In a May episode of the "Club Shay Shay" podcast, hosted by NFL Hall of Fame tight end Shannon Sharpe, that it took him 10 years to earn his first $1 million. Portnoy now claims he can pull in $5 million in a week. "Once you get over the hump, it just comes to you," Portnoy said. He added, "I couldn't believe it, I was making money not doing anything." headline: If You Invested $10K In Crown Castle Stock 10 Years Ago, How Much Would You Have Now?
summary: Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI), a real estate investment trust, is a leading U.S. provider of shared communications infrastructure, primarily owning and leasing a network of over 40,000 cell towers and around 90,000 miles of fiber supporting small ...

headline: This Couple Can't Decide Between Paying Off The Mortgage Early Or Investing Their Money Into The Stock Market
summary: Paying off your mortgage is a great achievement, and it also frees you from the largest monthly expenses you will ever have to face. One couple in their 50s has an opportunity to make additional mortgage payments so they can get out of debt early, but they're also thinking about putting the extra money into the stock market. The couple told Reddit that they have a 30-year mortgage at 3.55% APR and will pay it off in 11 years. However, the couple has $500 per month that they can put into the mort
